item.title: HF bike outside no 4 Wellington Gardens, 13th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Gardens, Charlton, London

item.title: Assorted fly tipping all along Wellington Gardens, 13th October
item.description:
